tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE CelebritiesFashionChoices (
  celebrity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  celebrity_name VARCHAR(255),
  fashion_style VARCHAR(100),
  outfit_color VARCHAR(50),
  event_type VARCHAR(50),
  fashion_photo_url VARCHAR(255),
  purchase_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
  purchase_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Celebrities (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	age INT,
	style VARCHAR(50),
	favorite_color VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE FashionChoices (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	celebrity_id INT,
	outfit_description TEXT,
	worn_date DATE,
	designer VARCHAR(50),
	FOREIGN KEY (celebrity_id) REFERENCES Celebrities(id)
);

CREATE TABLE Celebrities (
    celebrity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    occupation VARCHAR(50),
    fashion_style VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Outfits (
    outfit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    celebrity_id INT,
    outfit_name VARCHAR(50),
    outfit_type VARCHAR(50),
    color VARCHAR(20),
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    FOREIGN KEY (celebrity_id) REFERENCES Celebrities(celebrity_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Celebrities (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  nationality VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Apparel (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  celebrity_id INT,
  item_name VARCHAR(100),
  category VARCHAR(50),
  color VARCHAR(50),
  brand VARCHAR(50),
  price DECIMAL(10, 2),
  FOREIGN KEY (celebrity_id) REFERENCES Celebrities(id)
);

CREATE TABLE Outfits (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  celebrity_id INT,
  event_id INT,
  outfit_name VARCHAR(100),
  occasion VARCHAR(50),
  FOREIGN KEY (celebrity_id) REFERENCES Celebrities(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES Events(id)
);

CREATE TABLE celebrities (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    occupation VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE outfits (
    outfit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    celebrity_id INT,
    outfit_name VARCHAR(50),
    outfit_category VARCHAR(50),
    outfit_price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE accessories (
    accessory_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    celebrity_id INT,
    accessory_name VARCHAR(50),
    accessory_type VARCHAR(50),
    accessory_color VARCHAR(20)
);
